comments:
Description:After clicking on "OK" in "new data set" dialog, NullPointerException is thrown out.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a data source.
2. Select the data source, create a data set.
3. "New data set" dialog pops up.
4. Click on "OK" after editing query.
5. NullPointerException is thrown out.

Error 2005-12-09 09:39:33.578 java.lang.NullPointerException
